decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to satisfy the requirements of Condition 3 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission reference 41668/APP/2022/877, dated 13-07-22 (Use of existing two storey side extension as 1 x 1-bedroom dwelling. Erection of front porch extension, boundary treatment, separate amenity space, off-street parking, bin and cycle storage and landscaping to frontage). The information submitted fails to preserve and enhance visual amenity, contrary to Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12 and DMHB 14 of the of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 (2020) and Policies G1 of the London Plan (2021) and would fail to provide high quality garden space for existing and future occupants. The application is therefore refused.
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 3 (landscaping) of planning permission ref. 41668/APP/2022/877, dated 13-07-2022 (Use of existing two storey side extension as 1 x 1-bedroom dwelling. Erection of front porch extension, boundary treatment, separate amenity space, off-street parking, bin and cycle storage and landscaping to frontage.)
